Token.Abstract: Delegate object conforming to CMPApplePayDelegate protocol in order to retrieve responses from payment.
Delegate object conforming to CMPApplePayDelegate protocol in order to retrieve responses from payment.
Delegate object conforming to CMPApplePayDelegate protocol in order to retrieve responses from payment.
Validates parameters and instantiates a PKPaymentAuthorizationViewController object.

Parameter.Name: paymentMethod
Parameter.Abstract: A model object that contains all the Payment Method's related data.

Parameter.Name: paymentSummaryItems
Parameter.Abstract: An array of PKPaymentSummaryItem objects, defining a summary item in a payment requestâ€”for example, total, tax, discount, or grand total.

Parameter.Name: supportedNetworks
Parameter.Abstract: The payment networks supported by the merchant, for example @[ PKPaymentNetworkVisa, PKPaymentNetworkMasterCard ]. This property constrains payment cards that may fund the payment.

Parameter.Name: requiredShippingAddressFields
Parameter.Abstract: The shipping address fields inside ApplePay UI (PKAddressFieldPostalAddress|PKAddressFieldPhone|PKAddressFieldEmail|PKAddressFieldName)

Parameter.Name: onFailure
Parameter.Abstract: Returns an error, if the PKPaymentAuthorizationViewController object could not be instantiated

Token.Abstract: Determine whether this device can process payment requests. YES if the device is generally capable of making in-app payments. NO if the device cannot make in-app payments or if the user is restricted from authorizing payments.

Determine whether this device can process payment requests using specific payment network brands. Your application should confirm that the user can make payments before attempting to authorize a payment. Your application may also want to alter its appearance or behavior when the user is not allowed to make payments. YES if the user can authorize payments on this device using one of the payment networks supported by the merchant. NO if the user cannot authorize payments on these networks or if the user is restricted from authorizing payments.

Parameter.Name: supportedNetworks
Parameter.Abstract: The payment networks supported by the merchant, for example @[ PKPaymentNetworkVisa, PKPaymentNetworkMasterCard ]. This property constrains payment cards that may fund the payment.

Token.Abstract: A CMPPaymentMethod object that holds information for the current payment method.
A CMPPaymentMethod object that holds information for the current payment method.
A CMPPaymentMethod object that holds information for the current payment method.
An array of CMPPaymentItem objects, describing the selected items to purchase.
